1.title: Cage & Goldblum: Episode 1: The Fly Too
1.plot: When a fan sends Jeff Goldblum a set of home-made telepods, recreated from the film THE FLY, Jeff tries them out...on his new roommate. A new season of ROOMIES begins.

2.title: Cage & Goldblum: Episode 2: Jurassic Park
2.plot: This second episode has Jeff Goldblum putting on a screening of JURASSIC PARK with the original cast as Nicolas Cage tries to get someone to notice his script for CON AIR 2. Things get ugly when Chris Pratt shows up and crashes the party.

3.title: Cage & Goldblum: Episode 3 - Once Upon a Time in Mexico
3.plot: The boys head to Troublemaker Studios to meet with Robert Rodriguez about making Con Air 2. However, it seems they've run into more than they bargained for when Donald Trump buys Mexico and both Al Pacino and Christopher Walken get tossed into the mix. Throw in a cock fight, a donkey show, and Machete himself, Danny Trejo, and you've got a recipe for comedic disaster.

4.title: Cage & Goldblum: Episode 4 - Con Air 2 Movie Set
4.plot: In the 2-part season finale of CAGE and GOLDBLUM: ROOMIES, JoBlo.com's Eric Walkuski pays a visit to the set of the Nicolas Cage-penned CON AIR 2. Al Pacino and Jeff Goldblum quickly take over the set visit and interview such celebs as Steve Buscemi, Sean Connery, Gary Busey, and more. The team then head to the first test screening of the film and run into a very special surprise guest who agrees to help them with the reshoots. With the premiere of CON AIR 2 coming up next month, will the ROOMIES get the film together in time? Find out in CAGE and GOLDBLUM: ROOMIES ...

1.title: Episode 1: DeNiro and the Squirrel
1.plot: In this first (pilot) episode, we join the famed actors Al Pacino and Christopher Walken in their apartment, wondering how Robert DeNiro is seemingly getting more parts than they are.

2.title: Episode 2: Bobby Still Owes Me $75
2.plot: In this second episode, Al Pacino hopes for the possibility of a Godfather 4 and then takes Christopher Walken along with him to Robert DeNiro's agent's office, in order to figure out why Bobby keeps getting all these acting gigs and they don't. Oh and there's also the matter of the $75 that DeNiro owes Walken.

3.title: Episode 3: Aquaman's Grandfather
3.plot: Pacino and Walken are confronted by their landlord's son, Jeff Goldblum (making his 1st appearance in the series), after which Pacino finally gets a role in a superhero movie directed by James Wan. But Pacino being Pacino, tempers flare - again.

4.title: Episode 4: Halloween Special
4.plot: Al and Christopher going to a Halloween-themed table read for Godfather IV at Francis Ford Coppola's "mansion".

5.title: Episode 5: The Godfather's Retirement
5.plot: Al Pacino has retired from Hollywood and is now living in Sicily, Italy. Christopher Walken, on the other hand, remains back in NY and hosts "Saturday Night Live" along with a special guest. Oh and somehow the original Godfather movie and True Romance also make their way into this episode.

6.title: Episode 6: A Christmas Special
6.plot: Pacino returns from Italy, yet he's still pretty depressed and doesn't want to spend the holiday eve with Walken and his wife. Around the same time, a special guest appears at their doorstep, after which the show pays homage to "It's a Wonderful Life" with a tribute storyline that includes Morgan Freeman, a possible suicide, the original Godfather and Gary Busey?.

7.title: Episode 7: James Franco's House Party
7.plot: Now that Pacino has been nominated for an Oscar, he has to start glad-handing people in the business in order to get votes for himself. To that end, he and Walken attend James Franco's house party along with their new roommate, Nicolas Cage. The party is filled with celebs including the Franco brothers, Seth Rogen, Mathew McConaughey, Billy Bob Thorton, Sandra Bullock, Keanu Reeves, Jason Segel, Judd Apatow, Michael Cera, Jay Baruchel, Jared Leto and Jonah Hill. Oh and let's not forget the man in the VIP room, Sean Connery himself.

8.title: Episode 8: The Chevy Chase Show
8.plot: With the Oscars fast approaching, the race for "Best Actor" is tight between Robert De Niro and Al Pacino. The latter decides to take his efforts to win the award to the public and makes an appearance on the resuscitated "Chevy Chase" talk show. Needless to say, the interview goes awry and it isn't long before Al downshifts back into his anger and anti-social behavior. New appearances by Robert De Niro, Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Anthony Michael Hall and Randy Quaid.

9.title: Episode 9: Finale REDUX!
9.plot: The year-long feud between Al Pacino and Robert De Niro comes to a head at the Academy Awards ceremony where both actors are up for "Best Actor" of the year. With 4 of the 5 actors nominated for the award being Italian-Americans, this also leads to controversy and the hashtag #OscarsSoItalian. The episode also closes the loop on all of the storylines from Season 1 and features tons of celebrity cameos including Keanu Reeves, Jeff Goldblum, Sandra Bullock, Seth Rogen and many others.

imdb.title: Cage & Goldblum: Roomies
plot: Al Pacino and Christopher Walken are Roomies.
